tool_description: Validates tax return data against complex business rules, regulatory requirements, and logical consistency checks specific to tax law.

structured_data_id.description: Reference ID for tax return data to validate

rule_categories.description: Categories of rules to apply: mathematical, legal, logical, cross_form

tax_year.description: Tax year for applying appropriate business rules

return_type.description: Return type: individual, corporate, partnership, estate

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to report: info, warning, error, critical

custom_rules.description: Additional custom rule identifiers to apply

exclude_rules.description: Rule identifiers to exclude from validation

parallel_processing.description: Whether to run rule validation in parallel for performance

error_messages: Invalid data reference: Cannot access return data with provided structured_data_id
Unsupported rule category: Use categories from [mathematical, legal, logical, cross_form]
Invalid return type: Use one of [individual, corporate, partnership, estate]
Severity threshold error: Use one of [info, warning, error, critical]
Custom rule not found: One or more custom rule identifiers not recognized
Rule processing error: Error occurred during business rule validation execution
usage: Provide structured_data_id, rule_categories array, tax_year, and return_type. Optionally set severity_threshold, custom_rules, exclude_rules, and parallel_processing. Returns comprehensive rule validation results.

rules_passed.description: Number of business rules that passed validation

rules_failed.description: Number of business rules that failed validation

validation_errors.description: Detailed descriptions of failed rule validations

overall_compliance.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, review_required

critical_issues.description: Critical compliance issues requiring immediate attention
